src:
Mateo Kovacic, si Pekerja Keras di Balik Kemenangan Chelsea
03 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mateo Kovacic layak dianggap sebagai salah satu pemain terbaik Chelsea ketika mengalahkan Watford 2-1, Minggu (3/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Kovacic memang tidak mencetak gol, tapi kontribusinya luar biasa.
Kemenangan atas Watford itu tidak datang dengan mudah. Chelsea unggul lebih dahulu lewat gol Tammy Abraham dan Christian Pulisic, tapi situasi memburuk sejak Gerard Deulofeu mencetak satu gol balasan di menit ke-80.
Untungnya, Lampard punya duet gelandang Kovacic-Jorginho yang tampil luar biasa. Dua pemain ini benar-benar membantu The Blues mendominasi permainan, mereka melakukan segalanya.
Kovacic jelas tampil impresif, dia adalah bukti gelandang pekerja keras di lapangan. Bagaimana pendapat Lampard tentang performa Kovacic? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Mateo Kovacic, the Hard Worker Behind Chelsea's Victory
Nov 3 2019, 15:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mateo Kovacic deserves to be regarded as one of Chelsea's best players when they beat Watford 2-1 on Sunday (3/11/2019) early morning hrs. Kovacic did not score, but his contribution was extraordinary.
The victory over Watford did not come easily. Chelsea took the lead through goals from Tammy Abraham and Christian Pulisic, but the situation has worsened since Gerard Deulofeu scored one goal back in the 80th minute.
Fortunately, Lampard has a duo of midfielder Kovacic-Jorginho who appeared extraordinary. These two players really helped the Blues dominate the game, they did everything.
Kovacic clearly appeared impressive, he was proof of a hard-working midfielder in the field. How does Lampard think about Kovacic's performance? Read below, Bolaneters!
